content.body:
> <@littledan:matrix.org> We have been trying to identify any real slowdowns and don’t see one in V8. If anyone is experiencing a slowdown of private compared to public in V8, I would love to hear from you; maybe we could sponsor work to do the appropriate optimization.

what kind of measurements / benchmarks did you use for this?
